H3.text: who played bat masterson in the tv series. Gene Barry

A4.text: Gene Barry is best remembered for his leading roles in the films The Atomic City (1952) and The War of the Worlds (1953) and for his portrayal of the title characters in the TV series Bat Masterson and Burke's Law, among many roles.

A5.text: Hugh O'Brian as Wyatt Earp in the 1990 episode of Guns of Paradise, not Bat Masterson.
